examples.description: Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2016-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2016-12-31 -> And it has a contact in United Kingdom named Winston Churchill set to always charge VAT -> And the company has CIS categories -> And they are set up to run payroll online -> And they are running payroll in the 2017 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Alternate Arrangements payroll profile with Tax Code 1100L -> And they are paid £2000 monthly -> Given a sent invoice to Winston Churchill dated on 2016-03-10 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the invoice is set at 20% -> And a CIS line item is added for £1000 with 0% VAT -> When adding a payment in 750-1 for £800 dated 2016-04-10 to the invoice -> When running payroll for month 1 with HMRC -> Then the EPS XML will include
examples.full_description: EPS submission (Subcontractors) Paid invoice Given a UK Limited Company which was started on 2016-01-01 -> And its first accounting year ends on 2016-12-31 -> And it has a contact in United Kingdom named Winston Churchill set to always charge VAT -> And the company has CIS categories -> And they are set up to run payroll online -> And they are running payroll in the 2017 tax year on the 25th of each month -> Given a Alternate Arrangements payroll profile with Tax Code 1100L -> And they are paid £2000 monthly -> Given a sent invoice to Winston Churchill dated on 2016-03-10 -> And the CIS deduction rate on the invoice is set at 20% -> And a CIS line item is added for £1000 with 0% VAT -> When adding a payment in 750-1 for £800 dated 2016-04-10 to the invoice -> When running payroll for month 1 with HMRC -> Then the EPS XML will include
